introduction: CHARITY explores delicate family dynamics in desperate times and the mixed blessing of the massive influx of international AID during the UN peacekeeping mission. The story provides a window into the relationship between 2 brothers, torn apart by a gift which proves both a blessing and a curse. This piece touches on a larger struggle within Sierra Leone to maintain a national identity and dignity despite heavy dependence on international support in the post-war period. The Sermon in this film was written and performed by Arthur Pratt who in addition to his work with WeOwnTV is a pastor in the Freetown area.
